Reviews.Title: “Don't believe the hotel ads”
Reviews.Author: BlackWidow69
Reviews.Content: trip amsterdam freezing weekend bit shock realise comfortable spacious booked claustrophobic cupboard lethal bathroom basin hotel splendidly situated near museums clean pleasant staff drawbacks mean recommend unless looking fast overnight stop twin bore little resemblance photograph line misleading entire 4th floor roof hotel windows claustrophobic bathroom modern nicely major dangerous design flaw water spout basin projects risk putting eye try rinse shortsighted friend dangerous indeed pity location superb staff friendly welcoming

Reviews.Title: “Nice new quiet and good”
Reviews.Content: nice hotel quiet location walkable sights amsterdam leidesplein 5 mins walk variety bars restaurants found hotel recently renovated nice bathroom paid 50 pounds night definately value money 2 computer including printer free charge lobby wifi apparently free
